com.gembox.spreadsheet.conditionalformatting

Class FormatCondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gembox.spreadsheet.conditionalformatting.FormatCondition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.gembox.spreadsheet.internal.styles.CellFormatDataFormatHolder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AboveOrBelowAverageCondition, ColorScaleCondition, ContainCondition, DataBarCondition, FormulaCondition, IconSetCondition, TopOrBottomRankedCondition, UniqueOrDuplicateCondition

    public abstract class FormatCondition
extends Object
implements com.gembox.spreadsheet.internal.styles.CellFormatDataFormatHolder
    Represents a base class for all conditions that can be specified in a conditional formatting rule.
    See Also:
    Excel Conditional Formatting example

        public final ConditionalFormatRule getRule()
        Gets the conditional formatting rule associated with this condition.
        Returns:
        The conditional formatting rule associated with this condition.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Format condition is invalid because it is no longer associated with any conditional formatting rule.

      • toString

        public abstract String toString()
        Returns a String that represents this FormatCondition instance. This method should be used primarily for debugging purposes and should be considered volatile (format of its return value might change in future versions).
